description: read log of the specified Pod

parameters.description: The container for which to stream logs. Defaults to only container if there is one container in the pod.
parameters.name: container

parameters.description: Follow the log stream of the pod. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: follow

parameters.description: If set, the number of bytes to read from the server before terminating the log output. This may not display a complete final line of logging, and may return slightly more or slightly less than the specified limit.
parameters.name: limitBytes

parameters.description: Return previous terminated container logs. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: previous

parameters.description: A relative time in seconds before the current time from which to show logs. If this value precedes the time a pod was started, only logs since the pod start will be returned. If this value is in the future, no logs will be returned. Only one of sinceSeconds or sinceTime may be specified.
parameters.name: sinceSeconds

parameters.description: If set, the number of lines from the end of the logs to show. If not specified, logs are shown from the creation of the container or sinceSeconds or sinceTime
parameters.name: tailLines

parameters.description: If true, add an RFC3339 or RFC3339Nano timestamp at the beginning of every line of log output. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: timestamps
